channel.title: Need HelP! Editing: Stat Bonuses, Item Colours & Item names
channel.description:
Subject title says it all,
Im guessing a few people must know how to edit Stat bonuses - so a little help please.
I only know that XerozCheez knew how to edit item colours - well he said he did - but if anyone else knows much obliged.
And finely Editing item names, probably easy but I don't know so could someone shed some light onto that matter.
Thanks.

item.title: Need HelP! Editing: Stat Bonuses, Item Colours & Item names
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Editing item names, and the textures, is clientside.

Read full topic
item.source: Need HelP! Editing: Stat Bonuses, Item Colours & Item names
